translation.en: [narrator] German policemen in the occupied East, 1942.
translation.zh: 德国警察在1942年占领的东部

translation.en: They're here to enforce German rule in the conquered territories.
translation.zh: 他们来这里是为了在征服的领土上实行德国的统治

translation.en: Diligently, they carry out their orders.
translation.zh: 他们坚持执行他们的命令

translation.en: They have a special assignment:
translation.zh: 他们有一个特别的任务

translation.en: To shoot Jews by the hundreds and thousands.
translation.zh: 枪杀成千上万的犹太人

translation.en: At point-blank range.
translation.zh: 近距离射杀

translation.en: Historians and other experts have done extensive studies
translation.zh: 历史学家和其他专家对这些扣动扳机的人

translation.en: into the men who pulled these triggers.
translation.zh: 做了大量研究

translation.en: They want to know how a mass murder like this could happen.
translation.zh: 他们想知道像这样的大屠杀是怎么发生的

translation.en: And they make an astounding discovery.
translation.zh: 他们有了惊人的发现

translation.en: Those men didn't have to kill.
translation.zh: 那些人不是必须杀人的

translation.en: They didn't have to obey the order.
translation.zh: 他们不必遵从这个命令

translation.en: [Browning] If you had the courage to say, "I can't shoot,"
translation.zh: 如果你有勇气说 “我不能开枪”

translation.en: you may have been considered a coward,
translation.zh: 你可能被认为是一个懦夫

translation.en: you may have gotten a bad letter in your file,
translation.zh: 你的档案里可能会有一封差评的信

translation.en: but you were not punished in any severe way.
translation.zh: 但你不会被任何严厉的方式惩罚

translation.en: [narrator] 20 years after the war, there's a trial
translation.zh: 这场战争的二十年后

translation.en: for the murders committed by a Hamburg police unit.
translation.zh: 有一场汉堡警察部队所犯谋杀案的审判

translation.en: So, what was their motivation?
translation.zh: 所以他们的动机是什么？

translation.en: Why did they shoot?
translation.zh: 他们为什么开抢？

translation.en: [in German] They aren't ideologically-motivated, willing executioners.
translation.zh: 他们不是意识形态上驱动的出于自愿的刽子手

translation.en: They're not trained killers.
translation.zh: 他们不是受过训练的杀手

translation.en: They're people with civilian jobs, like taxi drivers or plumbers.
translation.zh: 他们是做平民工作的人比如出租车司机或水管工

translation.en: In every respect they were completely ordinary men.
translation.zh: 从各方面来看 他们完全就是平凡人

translation.en: [narrator] Hamburg in the summer of 1942.
translation.zh: 汉堡 1942年夏天

translation.en: Three years into the war.
translation.zh: 战争爆发三年

translation.en: The regime is recruiting men for a special assignment.
translation.zh: 政府正在为一项特殊任务招募人手

translation.en: [Browning] By 1942, you're really at the bottom of the manpower pool
translation.zh: 到了1942年 真是到了人力库的底部

translation.en: because of the casualties, of course,
translation.zh: 当然是因为大量人员伤亡

translation.en: that the army is suffering in Russia
translation.zh: 军队在俄罗斯遭受重创

translation.en: and the growing manpower they need
translation.zh: 以及他们需要越来越多的人力

translation.en: to occupy the ever-growing German empire.
translation.zh: 占据日益增长的德意志帝国

translation.en: They want every person they can get their hands on
translation.zh: 他们想要能弄到的每个人

translation.en: simply to fill the manpower shortage.
translation.zh: 只是为了填充劳动力的短缺

translation.en: [narrator] Older family men, who are no longer suitable for the German Wehrmacht,
translation.zh: 家中年长的男性已经不再适合做德国国防军

translation.en: are also called up. Many are not Nazi sympathizers,
translation.zh: 他们也接到了电话很多人都不是纳粹支持者

translation.en: nor are they overly hostile towards Jews.
translation.zh: 也不是过度仇恨犹太人的人

translation.en: But rather, they come from historically social democratic backgrounds.
translation.zh: 他们来自历史上民主社会的背景

translation.en: [Kühl, in German] They ranged from bakers and craftsmen
translation.zh: 他们的职业范围从烘焙师和工匠

translation.en: to carpenters and tradesmen with office jobs.
translation.zh: 到木匠和有办公室工作的商人

translation.en: That police battalion basically reflected
translation.zh: 那个警察大队基本反映了

translation.en: the average working population of Hamburg.
translation.zh: 汉堡普通的工作人群

translation.en: [narrator] They're drafted as reserve police officers.
translation.zh: 他们被选拔为预备警察

translation.en: Their training, however, hardly allows them enough time
translation.zh: 他们的训练基本没有足够的时间

translation.en: to prepare them for what awaits.
translation.zh: 为等待他们去做的事情做好准备

translation.en: On June the 21st, 1942,
they say goodbye to their families and leave home.
translation.zh: 他们向家人道别后离开了家

translation.en: [in German] They were given a fairly abstract description of their mission,
translation.zh: 对他们的任务上面给出了相当抽象的描述

translation.en: which consisted of securing the German-occupied areas.
translation.zh: 其中包括保守卫德国占领区

translation.en: [narrator] They're taken to Poland.
translation.zh: 他们被带去了波兰

translation.en: On June 25th, Reserve Police Battalion 101 arrives
translation.zh: 在6月25日 101预备警察大队

translation.en: in the southern part of the district Lublin.
translation.zh: 到达了卢布林区南部

translation.en: [Browning] We know there was then no preparation.
translation.zh: 我们知道当时没有准备

translation.en: They didn't know they were going to do this when they're sent to Poland.
translation.zh: 他们被送到波兰时并不知道要做什么

translation.en: The officers didn't know. Trapp really doesn't--
translation.zh: 警官们不知道 特拉普真的没有…

translation.en: Major Trapp doesn't learn what he's going to do until the day before.
translation.zh: 特拉普少校直到前一天才知道他要做什么

translation.en: [narrator] It is July 13th, 1942,
translation.zh: 那是1942年7月13日

translation.en: and the battalion has to report early in the morning.
translation.zh: 这支大队必须清早报到

translation.en: [Welzer, in German] Major Trapp, who delivers the order, is an older man
translation.zh: 传达这条命令的特拉普少校年纪稍大

translation.en: who is very popular with his men
translation.zh: 很受他的手下欢迎

translation.en: because he's not the typical authoritarian commander.
translation.zh: 因为他不是典型的专制指挥官

translation.en: The men call him "Papa" Trapp.
translation.zh: 他们叫他特拉普“爸爸”

translation.en: That indicates what kind of relationship they have.
translation.zh: 这表明了他们有着怎样的关系

translation.en: Major Trapp stands in front of the battalion and says,
translation.zh: 特拉普少校站在这支大队前说

translation.en: "I have a terrible order to give you today."
translation.zh: “今天我有一个可怕的命令给你们”

translation.en: [Browning] His voice is choking, he has tears streaming down his cheeks.
translation.zh: 他的声音哽咽着泪水滑落他的脸颊

translation.en: He's physically, you know, struggling visibly to control himself physically.
translation.zh: 他肉眼可见地在努力控制自己的身体

translation.en: This was, for him, a very terrible and difficult thing to do,
translation.zh: 对他来说这是非常可怕 非常困难的事情

translation.en: to explain to his men what he was going to ask them to do.
translation.zh: 去给他的手下解释他即将要求他们去做的事情

translation.en: [narrator] They are to shoot 1,500 Jewish men, women and children.
translation.zh: 他们要射杀1500名犹太男性、女性和儿童

translation.en: [Browning] And that's when he then makes this offer:
translation.zh: 这时候他做出提议

translation.en: "If any of the rank and file don't feel up to it,
translation.zh: “如果任何人感到无法胜任

translation.en: you can step out and you don't have to take part."
translation.zh: 可以出列 不必参与”

translation.en: [Welzer, in German] Telling people to step out if they don't want to participate
translation.zh: 告诉这些人如果他们不想参与就出列

translation.en: requires them to take action.
translation.zh: 需要他们采行动

translation.en: But when we are faced with a decision
translation.zh: 但当我们面对一个选择

translation.en: and we don't know exactly what the right thing is to do,
translation.zh: 我们不太清楚怎样做是正确的

translation.en: we usually do nothing.
translation.zh: 我们通常什么都不会做

translation.en: [Browning] One man does step out.
translation.zh: 确实有一个人出列了

translation.en: The captain of his company, who's very embarrassed
translation.zh: 他连队的队长非常难堪

translation.en: that one of his men would be the first "coward," uh,
translation.zh: 他的一个手下会成为第一个“懦夫”

translation.en: to not take part, starts to yell at him.
translation.zh: 不去参与 队长开始朝他大吼

translation.en: And Trapp cuts him off, takes the man under his protection.
translation.zh: 特拉普打断了他对这个人进行了保护

translation.en: And then about a dozen people follow his example.
translation.zh: 然后大约十来个人追随了他的行动

translation.en: [Trapp, in German] Attention! Dismiss!
translation.zh: 立正！解散！

translation.en: [in German] From a historical perspective, it's an incredibly interesting situation
translation.zh: 从历史的角度来看这是一个非常有趣的情况

translation.en: because the orders are documented
translation.zh: 因为这些命令有记载

translation.en: and it's clear from the way they were issued that the men did not have to kill.
translation.zh: 很明显从他们被给予的命令来看这些人不必杀人

translation.en: Part of the post-war narrative was that you had to take part,
translation.zh: 战后陈述的一部分说必须参与

translation.en: otherwise you would have been shot yourself.
translation.zh: 否则你就会被枪杀

translation.en: Here we can clearly show that no, that was not the case.
translation.zh: 这里我们能清楚地表明不 情况不是这样的

translation.en: They could decide.
translation.zh: 他们可以决定

translation.en: [narrator] The same was apparently true for all killing units.
translation.zh: 所有杀人部队明显都是如此

translation.en: To this day, not a single case has been found
translation.zh: 迄今为止 没有发现任何一例

translation.en: where a subordinate's life was in danger if he refused to shoot unarmed civilians.
translation.zh: 下属拒绝射杀手无寸铁的平民自己的生命就会受到威胁的案例

translation.en: It all starts in September 1939: the German Wehrmacht invades Poland.
translation.zh: 一切都开始于1939年9月德国国防军入侵波兰

translation.en: In just a few weeks, the country is defeated.
translation.zh: 短短几周后 这个国家就被击败了

translation.en: Millions of Poles fall into German hands and should now be kept under watch.
translation.zh: 数百万的波兰人落入德国人手中现在应该处于被监视中

translation.en: For this, the regime needs security forces.
translation.zh: 为此 政府需要安保部队

translation.en: In the German Reich, tens of thousands of men enlist
translation.zh: 在德意志帝国 数以万计的男性入伍

translation.en: to become policemen in the occupied territories.
translation.zh: 在占领区成为警察

translation.en: They hope to avoid military service on the front lines.
translation.zh: 他们希望避免在前线服兵役

translation.en: With so many applicants, the regime has the luxury to be very selective.
translation.zh: 有了如此多的申请者政府难得地开始挑剔

translation.en: [Klemp, in German] 160,000 men applied to volunteer for the police,
translation.zh: 16万男性申请了警察志愿者

translation.en: and only 26,000 to 30,000 could be accepted.
translation.zh: 只有2.6万到三万人可以被接收 （史蒂芬·克莱普 历史学家）

translation.en: They were then trained for six months
translation.zh: 他们接下来训练了六个月

translation.en: and, most crucially, received ideological training
translation.zh: 最重要的是 接受了意识形态的训练

translation.en: which made it fairly clear to them what would be expected of them.
translation.zh: 这让他们很清楚上面期望他们做什么

translation.en: They were told that, as the master race,
translation.zh: 他们被告知 作为优等民族

translation.en: they should ensure that National Socialist policies
translation.zh: 他们应该确保民族社会主义政策

translation.en: were established and executed in the occupied territories.
translation.zh: 在占领区的的建立和执行

translation.en: [narrator] After their training, the men find out what that means in reality.
translation.zh: 训练后 这些人知道了那在现实中意味着什么

translation.en: Their job is to help implement
translation.zh: 他们的工作是在占领区

translation.en: the brutal Nazi policies in the occupied territories.
translation.zh: 帮助实施残酷的纳粹政策

translation.en: Which is why the regime pick men who are sympathetic to the Nazi cause.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么政府挑选了认同纳粹事业的人

translation.en: Grouped into police battalions, they are sent to Poland.
translation.zh: 编排集合成各警察大队 送到波兰

translation.en: There they will oppress, persecute, and murder civilians,
translation.zh: 在那里他们会欺压、残害、谋杀平民

translation.en: in particular Jews.
translation.zh: 特别是犹太人

translation.en: [in German] As early as October or November 1939,
translation.zh: 早在1939年10月或11月

translation.en: those units began shooting civilians:
translation.zh: 那些小队开始射杀平民

translation.en: Polish resistance fighters, clergy, intellectuals, even Jews,
translation.zh: 波兰的反抗战士、神职人员知识分子 甚至犹太人

translation.en: driving people out, deporting them.
translation.zh: 把人赶出去 驱逐他们

translation.en: All in all, you could say that those units
translation.zh: 总而言之 可以说这些小队

translation.en: put the National Socialist extermination policy into practice.
translation.zh: 把民族社会主义灭绝政策付诸实践

translation.en: [narrator] Just two years later, the attack on the Soviet Union.
translation.zh: 就在两年后 袭击了苏联

translation.en: It is a war of conquest and annihilation.
translation.zh: 这是一场征服与毁灭的战争

translation.en: According to Germany's plans,
translation.zh: 根据德国的计划

translation.en: 30 million Soviets should die in order to free up space to live.
translation.zh: 为了释放生存空间应该死三千万苏联人

translation.en: Mobile killing units comprised of police and SS task forces,
translation.zh: 机动杀伤部队由警察和党卫军特种部队组成

translation.en: called "Einsatzgruppen," back up the troops in combat.
translation.zh: 叫做“特别行动队”支援战斗中的部队

translation.en: On June the 27th, 1941, Police Battalion 309 enters Bialystok.
translation.zh: 在1941年6月27日309警察大队进入了比亚韦斯托克省

translation.en: The ideologically-programmed men lock 800 Jews in the synagogue
translation.zh: 这群意识形态纳粹化的人把八百名犹太人锁在犹太教堂里

translation.en: and set it on fire.
translation.zh: 放火烧了

translation.en: And then they kill even more.
translation.zh: 后来又杀了更多的人

translation.en: The next day, the policemen are honored for "securing" the city, as they call it.
translation.zh: 第二天 这些警察因他们所谓的“保卫”这座城市而受到嘉奖

translation.en: Altogether, 18,000 men advance behind the front into the villages and towns,
translation.zh: 总共1.8万人在前线后方进入村镇 （纳粹占领的波兰 1941年苏联占领的波兰 1941年）

translation.en: where the mostly young and indoctrinated gunmen
translation.zh: 多数是接受教导的年轻枪手在村镇中

translation.en: shoot all the Jewish men, women and children dead.
translation.zh: 射杀所有的犹太男性、女性和儿童

translation.en: Now the Holocaust begins, the systematic mass murder of the Jews.
translation.zh: 这次屠杀开始了对犹太人体系化的大屠杀

translation.en: Many of the shooters are traumatized by the killings,
translation.zh: 很多枪手因为这场屠杀造成精神创伤

translation.en: which is one reason why large extermination camps
translation.zh: 这是其中一个原因导致了大规模灭绝性集中营

translation.en: like Auschwitz emerge at the end of 1941.
translation.zh: 出现在1941年末比如奥斯维辛集中营 （纳粹占领的波兰 1941-1942年）

translation.en: The process of mass murder needs to be made more effective
translation.zh: 大屠杀的过程对行凶者来说

translation.en: and more gentle on the perpetrators.
translation.zh: 需要更省力、更高效

translation.en: If we try to figure out
translation.zh: 如果我们试着搞清楚

translation.en: the proportions of Holocaust victims
translation.zh: 依照大屠杀受害者的死亡方式

translation.en: in terms of how they perished,
translation.zh: 看看人数的比例

translation.en: the best estimate, I think, is that
translation.zh: 我认为最佳的预计是

translation.en: about a half, close to three million,
translation.zh: 大概一半 差不多300万人死于集中营

translation.en: died in the death camps, in the gas chambers.
translation.zh: 大概一半 差不多300万人死于集中营 死于毒气室

translation.en: That close to a million died in what we might call conditions of incarceration:
translation.zh: 接近一百万人死于我们可能称之为监禁的环境

translation.en: Starving in epidemics, in the ghettos, the death marches at the end of the war.
translation.zh: 在犹太人区 饥饿在疫情中蔓延在战争最后 死亡大肆盛行

translation.en: Which means that over two million died by firing squad,
translation.zh: 这意味着超过两百万人死于枪杀行刑队

translation.en: died in these mass executions.
translation.zh: 死在这些大屠杀之中

translation.en: [narrator] Over two million people murdered, face-to-face with their killers.
translation.zh: 超过两百万人与行凶者面对面被谋杀

translation.en: A little-known fact even today, it is the "forgotten Holocaust."
translation.zh: 甚至今天也鲜为人知这是“被遗忘的大屠杀”

translation.en: Liepaja, summer 1941,
translation.zh: 利耶帕亚 1941年夏天

translation.en: in Einsatzgruppe A's area of operation.
translation.zh: 在特别行动队A的行动区

translation.en: This is the only film discovered
translation.zh: 这是唯一被发现的拍摄画面

translation.en: that shows a shooting of Jews on the Eastern Front.
translation.zh: 显示在东部前线对犹太人的射杀

translation.en: Officially, filming is forbidden,
translation.zh: 拍摄是官方禁止的

translation.en: because the killing is supposed to remain a secret.
translation.zh: 因为杀戮应该保密

translation.en: [Ferencz] They only made two mistakes.
translation.zh: 他们只犯了两个错误

translation.en: One, they kept a record of everything.
translation.zh: 第一 他们记录了每一件事

translation.en: And it was sent to Berlin,
translation.zh: 然后送到了柏林

translation.en: where it was consolidated with all the other from B, C and D.
translation.zh: 在柏林和B、C、D队其他所有记录进行了合并

translation.en: And it gave a comprehensive picture of whom they had killed in which cities,
translation.zh: 记录清楚地显示了他们在哪些城市 杀了哪些人

translation.en: in which town, in which unit, which command at what time.
translation.zh: 在哪个城镇 哪个部队由谁指挥 什么时间

translation.en: That was the first mistake, to keep the record.
translation.zh: 这是第一个错误 保存记录

translation.en: The second was that I found them.
translation.zh: 第二个错误是被我找到了

translation.en: [narrator] Nuremberg after the war.
translation.zh: 战后的纽伦堡

translation.en: The so-called "Thousand-Year Reich" lies in ruins.
translation.zh: 所谓的“千年帝国”处于一片废墟中

translation.en: In the city where the Nazis once held their Nazi Party Rallies,
translation.zh: 在这个纳粹曾举行纳粹党集会的城市

translation.en: the Allies want to bring German crimes to justice.
translation.zh: 同盟国想将德国战争犯罪归案受审

translation.en: In the Nuremberg Palace of Justice, the major war criminals are put on trial.
translation.zh: 在纽伦堡司法厅 主要战犯受审

translation.en: They ordered the crimes and will be prosecuted accordingly.
translation.zh: 他们下令施行这些犯罪将据此被提起控告

translation.en: But who carried out the murders?
translation.zh: 但谁执行了这些谋杀？

translation.en: The 27-year-old lawyer Benjamin Ferencz is tasked with finding out
translation.zh: 27岁的律师本杰明·费伦茨被委任

translation.en: and sets off to look for clues.
translation.zh: 负责查明并开始寻找线索

translation.en: In early 1947, his investigation team makes a significant find.
translation.zh: 1947年初 他的调查团队有了一个重大发现

translation.en: One day, one of my researchers came.
translation.zh: 有一天 我的一个研究人员来了

translation.en: He said, "Look what I found."
translation.zh: 他说“看我找到了什么”

translation.en: And he handed me a bunch of papers, "Ereignismeldungen aus der UDSSR."
translation.zh: 他递给了我一堆文件“来自苏联的事件报告”

translation.en: [narrator] These are death lists from the mobile killing units,
translation.zh: 这些是来机动杀伤部队

translation.en: the SS Einsatzgruppen.
translation.zh: 党卫军特别行动队的死亡名单

translation.en: The murder of hundreds of thousands of people was documented
translation.zh: 把对成千上万人的谋杀

translation.en: as a record of achievement.
translation.zh: 当做一种成就而记录

translation.en: [Ferencz] I took a little adding machine
translation.zh: 我拿了一个计算器

translation.en: and I began to add up Einsatzgruppe A reports.
translation.zh: 我开始汇总特别行动队A报告

translation.en: 10,000 killed here. 15,000 killed here. 20,000 killed here.
translation.zh: 这里有一万人被杀 这里1.5万人这里两万人被杀

translation.en: And I started to add them up.
translation.zh: 我开始把这些数字加起来

translation.en: When I added over a million, I said, "That's enough."
translation.zh: 当我加到超过一百万时我说“够了”

translation.en: [narrator] Ferencz wants to put the SS men responsible on trial.
translation.zh: 费伦茨想让党卫军犯罪的人接受审判

translation.en: But his superior refuses.
translation.zh: 但他的上级拒绝

translation.en: They don't have the budget or the time.
translation.zh: 他们没有预算 也没有时间

translation.en: I got a little bit furious and said,
translation.zh: 我有点生气 我说

translation.en: "You can't let these guys go!
translation.zh: “你不能放过这些人！”

translation.en: I have a million murders in my hand, you're not going let them go!"
translation.zh: 我手上有一百万人的屠杀你不能放过他们！”

translation.en: So he said, "Well, can you do it in addition to your other work?"
translation.zh: 于是他说：“你能不耽误其他工作把这个也做了吗？”

translation.en: I said, "Sure." He said, "Okay. You got it."
translation.zh: 我说“当然” 他说“好 那你做吧”

translation.en: And so it came to pass that for my first case as a lawyer,
translation.zh: 于是这就成了我律师生涯的第一个案子

translation.en: I became the chief prosecutor of the biggest murder trial in human history.
translation.zh: 我成为了人类历史上最大谋杀案的首席检察官

translation.en: Vengeance is not our goal, nor do we seek merely a just retribution.
translation.zh: 复仇不是我们的目标我们想要的也不只是报应

translation.en: We ask this court to affirm by international penal action,
translation.zh: 我们要求法庭通过国际刑事诉讼确认

translation.en: man's right to live in peace and dignity.
translation.zh: 人类生活在和平和尊严下的权利

translation.en: [narrator] The accused are 24 SS men from the Einsatzgruppen.
translation.zh: 被告是特别行动队的24名党卫军

translation.en: They all led mobile killing units.
translation.zh: 他们都领导机动杀伤部队

translation.en: [Welzer, in German] They don't fit with Hollywood's image of a Nazi perpetrator.
translation.zh: 他们并不符合好莱坞中纳粹行凶者的形象

translation.en: That image is a henchman who is not particularly intelligent
translation.zh: 那种形象是不太聪明的党羽

translation.en: and who only cares about killing as many people as possible.
translation.zh: 心里只想着杀尽可能多的人

translation.en: But the historical reality is that they were nothing like that.
translation.zh: 但历史事实是 他们不是那样的人

translation.en: Some of the Einsatzgruppen leaders had double doctorate degrees.
translation.zh: 有些特别行动队的领导还有双博士学位

translation.en: They're mostly middle-class, educated, really sophisticated people
translation.zh: 他们多数是中产受过良好的教育 非常圆滑世故的人

translation.en: who could definitely hold a conversation about Mozart or Beethoven.
translation.zh: 绝对能聊莫扎特或贝多芬的那种人

translation.en: We will begin with the defendant Ohlendorf.
translation.zh: 我们从被告奥伦多夫开始

translation.en: [narrator] One of them is Otto Ohlendorf, the former head of Einsatzgruppe D.
translation.zh: 其中一位是奥托·奥伦多夫 曾是特别行动队D的首领

translation.en: He gave orders to 600 men who murdered 90,000 people in one year.
translation.zh: 他给600人下令这600人一年中杀了九万人

translation.en: [Ferencz] Ohlendorf made a very good impression on me.
translation.zh: 奥伦多夫给我留下了非常好的印象

translation.en: I knew he was the father of five children.
translation.zh: 我知道他是五个孩子的父亲

translation.en: Uh, he was honest.
translation.zh: （首席检察官 特别行动队一案） 他很诚实

translation.en: [Earl] He cut a good figure, you know?
translation.zh: 他的形象很好 知道吗？

translation.en: He was handsome. He was articulate.
translation.zh: 他很帅 说话很清晰

translation.en: He had a sureness to himself
translation.zh: 他有一种胸有成竹

translation.en: that people found attractive.
translation.zh: 让人觉得很有魅力

translation.en: I think that the world kind of expected this person
translation.zh: 我认为世界会认为

translation.en: who was in charge of--
translation.zh: 这个负责…

translation.en: in charge of a mobile killing unit to be something different.
translation.zh: 一支机动杀伤部队的人不会是这个样子

translation.en: They expected him to be ugly, old, crazy, pathological, sadistic,
translation.zh: 大家会认为他又丑又老疯癫、病态、虐待

translation.en: dumb, maybe, a misfit of some kind.
translation.zh: 也许有点沉默 有一些不合群

translation.en: But he was an accomplished man.
translation.zh: 但他是个很有才华的人

translation.en: The judge liked him.
translation.zh: 法官很喜欢他

translation.en: The judge said: "I like this guy. He seems nice.
translation.zh: 法官说：“我很喜欢这个人这个人看起来不错”

translation.en: But he killed people. I don't understand it."
translation.zh: “但他会杀人 我不理解”

translation.en: [narrator] Ohlendorf surprises the court with his openness.
translation.zh: 奥伦多夫用他的坦诚震惊了法庭

translation.en: The judge thanks him several times for the statements he already made
translation.zh: 法官感谢了他很多次 因为他在1946年审问的时候

translation.en: to the Allies during an interrogation in 1946.
translation.zh: 因为他在1946年审问的时候 已经对盟军说出的证词

translation.en: [judge] In what way they were transported to the place of execution?
translation.zh: 他们是怎么被运输到处决地的？

translation.en: [Ohlendorf in German] They were driven there in lorries.
translation.zh: 他们是被卡车送到那里的

translation.en: Always as many as could be executed right away.
translation.zh: 总是能处决多少就立刻送过去

translation.en: [judge] Was that your idea?
translation.zh: 那是你的主意吗？

translation.en: [Ohlendorf in German] Yes.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: [judge] In what positions were the victims shot?
translation.zh: 受害者被枪击姿势是什么样？

translation.en: [Ohlendorf in German] Standing or kneeling.
translation.zh: 站着或跪下

translation.en: [narrator] Just as it was on July 13th, 1942.
translation.zh: 就像1942年7月13日

translation.en: Hamburg Reserve Police Battalion 101 is on its way to the first execution.
translation.zh: 汉堡101预备警察大队去往第一次执行处决的路上

translation.en: The policemen are unprepared for what awaits them.
translation.zh: 警察对即将发生的事情毫无准备

translation.en: They had certainly not been instructed in how to conduct a firing squad massacre.
translation.zh: 他们显然没有经过指导怎样执行枪击小队屠杀

translation.en: It's all improvised the first time.
translation.zh: 第一次全都是即兴发挥

translation.en: [Kühl, in German] They were taken to a forest.
translation.zh: 他们被带到了森林里

translation.en: Then the policemen led them into the forest one by one,
translation.zh: 然后警察把他们一个接一个领到森林里

translation.en: some of them women, some of them children.
translation.zh: 有些是女性 有些是儿童

translation.en: So instead of depersonalizing the execution,
translation.zh: 所以处决中没有进行去人格化

translation.en: and instead of keeping distance between the killer and the victim,
translation.zh: 也没有让枪手和受害者之间保持距离

translation.en: here you have one-to-one identification with the person you're going to kill,
translation.zh: 这里的情况是你对即将要杀的人进行一对一的识别

translation.en: and you kill that person at point-blank range.
translation.zh: 然后近距离杀了那个人

translation.en: Several of the policemen reported having conversations
translation.zh: 几名警察报告走进森林的时候

translation.en: as they walked them into the forest.
translation.zh: 与受害者进行了对话

translation.en: Some, in fact, were German Jews who had left Germany earlier.
translation.zh: 有些人还是早期离开德国的德国犹太人

translation.en: One of the Jews' family had owned the kino, the cinema, in Hamburg,
translation.zh: 有一个犹太家庭持有汉堡的基诺电影院

translation.en: where this man had gone to see movies.
translation.zh: 这个杀手还去看过电影

translation.en: And he discovers he's going to kill the cinema owner
translation.zh: 他发现要杀掉这个他曾经去看电影的

translation.en: where he used to go watch the movies.
translation.zh: 电影院老板

translation.en: And needless to say,
translation.zh: 更不用说这件事的心理伤害

translation.en: the psychological toll of this was very great.
translation.zh: 更不用说这件事的心理伤害 非常大

translation.en: [in German] The victims feared for their lives and knew death was moments away.
translation.zh: 受害者害怕失去性命知道死亡即将来临

translation.en: And the policemen were experiencing an emotional crisis
translation.zh: 警察在经历情绪危机

translation.en: because they knew they were about to have to kill someone at point-blank range.
translation.zh: 因为他们知道即将近距离杀人

translation.en: [Browning] So, it's an extraordinarily gruesome experience.
translation.zh: 所以这是一次非常可怕的经历

translation.en: And that's when some of the men began to get sick,
translation.zh: 就在这个时候 一些人开始恶心

translation.en: because they're covered with brain matter and blood.
translation.zh: 因为他们身上都是脑浆和血

translation.en: They-- They throw up, they-- they get demoralized, they can't continue.
translation.zh: 他们会吐 他们…意志消沉 没办法继续

translation.en: [narrator] The massacre lasts for hours.
translation.zh: 屠杀持续了几个小时

translation.en: In the end, 1,500 Jewish men, women and children lie dead in the forest.
translation.zh: 最后 1500名犹太男性、女性和孩子倒在了森林里

translation.en: [Browning] When they went home that night, they were offered liquor,
translation.zh: 他们那天晚上回家的时候给他们发了酒

translation.en: and most of them got drunk, but most of them couldn't eat.
translation.zh: 他们很多人都喝醉了但他们都没办法吃饭

translation.en: The-- The food was put out, but most of them had no appetite to eat.
translation.zh: 食物摆放出来但多数人都没有胃口吃

translation.en: Uh, and some of them had nightmares that night.
translation.zh: 有些人那天晚上做了噩梦

translation.en: One man even, I guess, shooting his gun into the ceiling in a kind of nightmare.
translation.zh: 有一个男人甚至还在做梦中把枪开到了天花板上

translation.en: And, uh, as another man told one of his-- his noncommissioned officers,
translation.zh: 另一个人告诉他无委任状的警官

translation.en: "If I had to do that again, I would go crazy."
translation.zh: “如果我再要做一次 我会疯的”

translation.en: Uh, so there were--
translation.zh: 所以有…

translation.en: For some of the men, this was just an absolutely horrifying experience,
translation.zh: 对有些人来说 这是非常可怕的经历

translation.en: and they couldn't imagine ever doing it again.
translation.zh: 他们没办法想象再做一次

translation.en: [narrator] The regime knows what it is asking of the men.
translation.zh: 政府知道他们让这些人做什么

translation.en: As early as the summer of 1941,
translation.zh: 早在1941年夏天

translation.en: a high-ranking SS leader refers to the "psychological support
translation.zh: 一位高权力的党卫军领导人谈到“给参与这项行动的人

translation.en: for the men involved in this deed."
translation.zh: 心理支持”

translation.en: The "impressions of the day" were to be "blotted out
translation.zh: “今天的印象”要通过

translation.en: by holding gatherings of camaraderie in the evenings."
translation.zh: 晚上友谊的聚会进行抹杀

translation.en: Otto Ohlendorf faced the same problems
translation.zh: 奥托·奥伦多夫跟他

translation.en: with his men who took part in the massacres.
translation.zh: 参与大屠杀的手下面临了同样的问题

translation.en: [in German] Otto Ohlendorf said,
translation.zh: 奥托·奥伦多夫说

translation.en: "My men suffered more than the victims."
translation.zh: “我的手下比受害者更痛苦”

translation.en: Looking at that from today's perspective,
translation.zh: 从今天的角度来看

translation.en: that's an absurd reinterpretation.
translation.zh: 这是非常荒谬的解读

translation.en: It's the perpetrators looking for psychological mechanisms
translation.zh: 这是行凶者在找寻心理学机制

translation.en: that they can use to cast themselves as victims
translation.zh: 用来把自己伪装成受害者

translation.en: because of the fact they had to do things that made them suffer.
translation.zh: 因为他们被迫做让他们痛苦的事

translation.en: [Ferencz] He had Mitleid with his men if they had to, uh, do something
translation.zh: 他的手下被迫去做让他们痛苦的事情

translation.en: which would be painful for them.
translation.zh: 他感到同情

translation.en: Some of the Einsatzgruppen soldiers
translation.zh: 特别行动队有些士兵

translation.en: would take an infant child and smash their head against a tree.
translation.zh: 会举起一个婴儿 把头碾碎在树上

translation.en: Save ammunition.
translation.zh: 省点弹药

translation.en: He-- Ohlendorf explained, "I didn't allow my men to do that.
translation.zh: 他… 奥伦多夫解释说“我没有允许我的人那样做

translation.en: If there were infants, I told them to have the mother hold the infant to her chest,
translation.zh: 如果有婴儿 我都告诉他们让婴儿的母亲胸口抱着婴儿

translation.en: and then aim for the baby.
translation.zh: 然后瞄准婴儿

translation.en: Because then, they kill both of them with one shot,
translation.zh: 因为那样就可以一枪杀掉两个人

translation.en: and they save ammunition, and the mothers stop crying."
translation.zh: 可以节省弹药 母亲也不会哭了

translation.en: So, that was Mitleid for his men, not for the victims.
translation.zh: 所以他有对手下的同情但没有对受害者的同情

translation.en: [narrator] In the Einsatzgruppen trial,
translation.zh: 在特别行动队一案中

translation.en: the court wants to know what motivated Ohlendorf to issue these orders to kill.
translation.zh: 法庭想知道是什么驱动了奥伦多夫下达这些杀人的命令

translation.en: He claims he was simply being loyal to his government.
translation.zh: 他说他只是忠于他的政府

translation.en: [Ohlendorf, in German] The order to liquidate
translation.zh: 进行肃清的命令

translation.en: came from the Führer of the Reich.
translation.zh: 来自于帝国的独裁元首

translation.en: So, in that sense, it's a policy determined by the Führer.
translation.zh: 所以一定程度上说这是独裁元首决定的政策

translation.en: [narrator] In the spirit of Nazi propaganda,
translation.zh: 在纳粹政治宣传的精神中

translation.en: Ohlendorf believes the Jews are responsible
translation.zh: 奥伦多夫相信是犹太人造成了

translation.en: for communism in the Soviet Union,
translation.zh: 苏联的共产主义

translation.en: and therefore enemies of the German Reich.
translation.zh: 因此是德意志帝国的敌人

translation.en: Why does Ohlendorf believe propaganda is truth?
translation.zh: 为什么奥伦多夫相信那些政治宣传是真的？

translation.en: I don't think he believed it was propaganda.
translation.zh: 我不觉得他认为那是政治宣传

translation.en: He was raised in a nationalist family.
translation.zh: 他在一个民族主义家庭长大

translation.en: University, he had professors who taught
translation.zh: 在大学 有教授教他

translation.en: about the problems of-- of Bolshevism,
translation.zh: 布尔什维主义的问题

translation.en: the problems of communists, the problems of Jews.
translation.zh: 共产主义的问题 犹太的问题

translation.en: You get fed it, and you get fed it, and you get fed it.
translation.zh: 不停地给你灌输、灌输

translation.en: And it reinforces, I think, your already existing beliefs, you know?
translation.zh: 就不断加强了你心中已经存在的信念 知道吧？

translation.en: And then a government comes to power that says, "Yes, you know, this is true."
translation.zh: 然后一个政府开始掌权政府说“对 这是真的”

translation.en: He certainly believed that, um-- that Bolsheviks were Jews
translation.zh: 他当然相信…布尔什维克是犹太人

translation.en: and that they should be killed.
translation.zh: 他们该杀

translation.en: [narrator] A survivor of one of the massacres testifies in court after the war.
translation.zh: 大屠杀的一名幸存者在战后的法庭作证

translation.en: [survivor, in Russian] They lined us up at the edge of the pit, squeezed together.
translation.zh: 他们在坑边排队 挤在一起

translation.en: Then they started shooting.
translation.zh: 然后他们开始枪击

translation.en: I closed my eyes, clenched my fists,
translation.zh: 我闭上眼睛 握紧拳头

translation.en: tensed all my muscles and jumped.
translation.zh: 所有肌肉紧绷 跳了下去

translation.en: The fall seemed to take forever.
translation.zh: 坠落的时间无比漫长

translation.en: Finally, I landed on the bodies.
translation.zh: 终于 我掉到了尸体上

translation.en: I hadn't been hit.
translation.zh: 我没有被击中

translation.en: After a while, the shooting stopped.
translation.zh: 一段时间后 枪声停止了

translation.en: I heard the Germans coming down into the pit…
translation.zh: 我听到德国人下到了坑中

translation.en: …to finish off those who were still moaning.
translation.zh: 去解决掉那些依然在呻吟的人

translation.en: Some were still twitching and convulsing in their death throes.
translation.zh: 有些人还在因为死亡的疼痛抽搐、抽筋

translation.en: They shot everyone who was still alive.
translation.zh: 他们用手电筒看坑里是否还有活人有就开枪

translation.en: I played dead, scared of being discovered.
translation.zh: 我装死 很害怕被发现

translation.en: [narrator] Most of the men in Reserve Police Battalion 101
translation.zh: 101预备警察大队的多数人

translation.en: were not Nazis by conviction.
translation.zh: 都不是坚定的纳粹

translation.en: Twenty years after the war,
translation.zh: 战后20年

translation.en: they describe to the investigators how they experienced the murder of the Jews.
translation.zh: 他们描述给调查人员怎样经历了这场犹太人的大屠杀

translation.en: [officer 1, in German] I can still see the image in my mind.
translation.zh: 我现在脑海中依然能看到那些画面

translation.en: I remember thinking back then
translation.zh: 我记得当时想

translation.en: that we didn't have enough earth to cover so many bodies.
translation.zh: 我们没有那么多土去填埋那么多尸体

translation.en: [officer 2, in German] I was angry that we had become animals, murderers.
translation.zh: 我很生气我们变成了禽兽、杀人犯

translation.en: [officer 3, in German] We didn't see Jews as human beings.
translation.zh: 我们没有把犹太人当成人类看待

translation.en: The first massacre of Jews in Jozefow
translation.zh: 在波兰佛镇对犹太人的第一场屠杀

translation.en: was very upsetting, was very traumatic.
translation.zh: 非常可怕 造成了很多痛苦

translation.en: And then they get used to it very quickly.
translation.zh: 然后他们很快就适应了

translation.en: The speed with which they became habituated to what they were doing,
translation.zh: 他们适应所做事情的速度

translation.en: the speed with which they got used to killing as a kind of normal routine
translation.zh: 他们适应杀人把它当做一种日常行为

translation.en: was one of the real surprises to me, uh, that came out of the interrogations.
translation.zh: 对我来说 是在审问中非常意外的一件事

translation.en: You can see in the first few killing operations…
translation.zh: 能看出来在最初的几次杀人行动中

translation.en: [clears throat] …the men can describe those in great detail.
translation.zh: 执行的人可以描述得非常详细

translation.en: Thereafter, it becomes a real blur.
translation.zh: 之后的描述就非常模糊了

translation.en: They can't even remember which town it was in.
translation.zh: 他们都不记得事情发生在哪个城镇

translation.en: [narrator] The men's behavior is strongly influenced
translation.zh: 执行者的行为很大程度上受到

translation.en: by the leadership of the battalion.
translation.zh: 大队领导的影响

translation.en: At the helm is Major Wilhelm Trapp,
translation.zh: 大队最高领导是威海姆·特拉普少校

translation.en: who commands the 500 men.
translation.zh: 指挥500人

translation.en: [Welzer, in German] He was a popular, respected superior, and he said,
translation.zh: 他是个受欢迎的受人尊敬的上级 他说

translation.en: "If I had a choice, I wouldn't give you the order. But…"
translation.zh: “如果我可以选择我不会给你们下达这个命令 但是…”

translation.en: He was calling on them for solidarity, to support him with this task,
translation.zh: 他号召他们团结起来支持他完成这个任务

translation.en: which didn't come from him,
translation.zh: 而这个任务不是由他发起的

translation.en: and asking them not to abandon him.
translation.zh: 要他们不要放弃他

translation.en: [in German] It was a combination of coercion and free will.
translation.zh: 那是强迫和自由意志的结合

translation.en: They were told that they could refuse to do it,
translation.zh: 他们被告知可以拒绝这样做

translation.en: but that they would have to accept their comrades having to do it instead.
translation.zh: 但那样他们必须接受战友要代替他们去做

translation.en: That combination of,
translation.zh: 那种组合

translation.en: "It has to be done, the police battalion has to do the job"
translation.zh: “这件事必须完成警察大队必须做这项工作”

translation.en: and, "If you're weak, you can refuse, but it's at the expense of your comrades."
translation.zh: 和“如果你软弱 可以拒绝但是要牺牲你的战友”

translation.en: That combination creates the pressure
translation.zh: 这种组合制造了压力

translation.en: which led to most of them taking part in the shootings.
translation.zh: 导致了他们多数人参与了枪决

translation.en: [narrator] Only a few policemen refuse to carry out the order to kill.
translation.zh: 只有几名警察拒绝执行杀人的命令

translation.en: [officer 1, in German] No! We were already hoping it was over.
translation.zh: 不！我们已经在希望结束了

translation.en: More potatoes?
translation.zh: 再来点土豆？

translation.en: [Welzer, in German] Objectively speaking,
translation.zh: 客观来讲

translation.en: nothing bad happened to the objectors.
translation.zh: 反对者没有发生什么坏事

translation.en: They were assigned work cleaning latrines and that kind of thing.
translation.zh: 他们被分配去做打扫厕所之类的工作

translation.en: They were called names: bastard, dirty rat, sissy and so on.
translation.zh: 他们被别人取绰号混蛋、脏老鼠、娘炮等等

translation.en: Those men were not at home,
translation.zh: 那些人没在家乡

translation.en: they didn't go back to their families at the end of the day.
translation.zh: 晚上并不能回到家人身边

translation.en: Instead, they were in a group of men for an unforeseeable amount of time,
translation.zh: 而是跟一群男人在一起无法预知还要多久

translation.en: always with the same people, who could torment them,
translation.zh: 总是跟同样的会折磨他们的人在一起

translation.en: insult them and exclude them.
translation.zh: 侮辱他们 排挤他们

translation.en: You need to be very self-assured to be able to endure that.
translation.zh: 你需要对自己有足够的信念才能忍受这些

translation.en: It might be only a social punishment and not a physical one,
translation.zh: 可能只是社交上的惩罚没有身体上的惩罚

translation.en: but for human beings, a social punishment is one of the hardest things to bear.
translation.zh: 但是对人类来说 社交上的惩罚是最难以承受的

translation.en: [Browning] What's most on their mind, what's driving them?
translation.zh: 他们心里在想什么驱动他们的是什么？

translation.en: I don't think they're obsessed with Jews.
translation.zh: 我不认为他们对犹太人那么执迷

translation.en: They're more motivated about--
translation.zh: 他们的更大的驱动力应该是…

translation.en: by what they think other people think about them
translation.zh: 他们认为别人会怎么想他们

translation.en: than they are about what they think about Jews.
translation.zh: 而不是他们怎么想犹太人

translation.en: I think they're very much obsessed with themselves,
translation.zh: 我觉得他们很执迷于自己

translation.en: with how they're going to get through this.
translation.zh: 怎样度过这一切

translation.en: [narrator] Captain Wolfgang Hoffmann believes he can take the pressure,
translation.zh: 沃尔夫冈·霍夫曼上尉认为他可以承受这种压力

translation.en: but he has a problem.
translation.zh: 但他有一个问题

translation.en: [Browning] One of the captains develops a psychosomatic illness.
translation.zh: 其中一个队长出现了心理身体疾病

translation.en: He gets sick every time his company is supposed to carry out a killing action.
translation.zh: 每次他的连队应该进行一次杀戮行动的时候 他都会生病

translation.en: And so, he is in bed with terrible stomach cramps and can't even get out of bed.
translation.zh: 于是他因为严重的胃痉挛卧床休息 都没办法下床

translation.en: And he has to have the killing action led by his subordinate.
translation.zh: 他必须让下属领导杀人行动

translation.en: He wanted to be a killer, but his body broke down.
translation.zh: 他想成为杀手 但他的身体崩溃了

translation.en: And the men, of course, thought this was terribly cowardly.
translation.zh: 男人们当然认为这是非常懦弱的行为

translation.en: He was desperately embarrassed.
translation.zh: 他非常难堪

translation.en: [narrator] Things are very different for Captain Julius Wohlauf.
translation.zh: 对朱利亚斯·霍劳夫队长情况非常不同

translation.en: He is ambitious, wants to carve out a career and excel at his job.
translation.zh: 他很有野心 想搏出一番事业在工作中做出一番成就

translation.en: And he's in love.
translation.zh: 他陷入了爱情

translation.en: Wohlauf had married in Hamburg in June, shortly before the first massacre.
translation.zh: 霍劳夫在六月汉堡结婚了就在第一次大屠杀之前不久

translation.en: As an officer, he is allowed to take his wife to Poland, to the area of operations.
translation.zh: 作为军官 他可以带着新娘来波兰来到行动区域

translation.en: He wants to make up for his missed honeymoon.
translation.zh: 他想弥补错过的蜜月

translation.en: [Browning] Wohlauf brings his pregnant bride on a ghetto clearing.
translation.zh: 霍劳夫带他怀孕的新娘去了一次犹太人区肃清

translation.en: The most horrible ghetto clearing of the entire operation
translation.zh: 在所有人的证词中 整个行动中

translation.en: in virtually all the men's testimony
translation.zh: 最恐怖的一次犹太人区肃清

translation.en: was when they took 11,000 Jews from Miedzyrzec,
translation.zh: 就是他们从缅济热茨带走1.1万个犹太人

translation.en: shot a thousand of them just in the ghetto clearing actions--
translation.zh: 在犹太人区肃清行动中射杀了一千个

translation.en: the streets were just lined with dead bodies--
translation.zh: 街上横尸遍野

translation.en: and put the other 10,000 on the train to Treblinka.
translation.zh: 剩下的一万人送上了去特雷布林卡的火车

translation.en: The train is so overcrowded they have to force people in and nail the doors shut,
translation.zh: 火车上太挤了 他们只能把人推进去把门钉上才能关住

translation.en: or they will burst open.
translation.zh: 不然门会爆开

translation.en: And she's standing on the square watching this, witnessing all of this.
translation.zh: 她就站在广场上观看 目睹着这一切

translation.en: That shows, in a sense, how Wohlauf was proud of what he was doing,
translation.zh: 这一定程度上展现出霍劳夫对他做的事情很骄傲

translation.en: wanted to show it off to his bride.
translation.zh: 想要向他的新娘炫耀

translation.en: He wasn't ashamed or embarrassed at all.
translation.zh: 他一点都没有感到羞愧或者丢脸

translation.en: [narrator] Ghettos begin springing up all over the East.
translation.zh: 犹太人区开始在整个东部涌现

translation.en: People who are kept cooped up inside them before they are murdered.
translation.zh: 人们一直被关在其中 直到被杀害

translation.en: The victims filmed and photographed by their tormenters.
translation.zh: 受害者被他们的折磨者拍照、摄影

translation.en: Policemen guard the people and kill them.
translation.zh: 警察看守着人们 杀了他们

translation.en: But only as long as the National Socialists are in power.
translation.zh: 但只在民族社会主义统治的期间才发生

translation.en: Neither before nor after this period
translation.zh: 在这段时间之前或者之后都没有

translation.en: did a policeman decide to kill Jews en masse.
translation.zh: 任何警察决定大屠杀犹太人

translation.en: [Earl] I don't believe that people are born to kill.
translation.zh: 我不认为人们生来就是杀人狂魔

translation.en: I do think that we can become killers, though, under the right circumstances.
translation.zh: 我认为人们可以后天在某些特定的情况下变成杀人犯

translation.en: We have to think about what the relationship is
translation.zh: 我们必须思考个人和国家

translation.en: between the individual and the state.
translation.zh: 是什么关系

translation.en: You know, if the state is a state that says,
translation.zh: 如果这个国家说

translation.en: "This is the group we hate
translation.zh: “这是我们讨厌的群体

translation.en: and I want you to... or we want you to make sure that that group is dealt with,"
translation.zh: 我想让你们 或者我们想让你们确保这个群体的人都处理掉”

translation.en: that's a really important relationship.
translation.zh: 这是非常重要的关系

translation.en: These individuals, even if they share the ideology of the state
translation.zh: 这些个人就算跟国家有着相同的意识形态

translation.en: for whom they are actors or for whom they are instruments,
translation.zh: 对国家来说 他们是执行者他们是工具

translation.en: um, when the state no longer holds power,
translation.zh: 当国家不再拥有权力的时候

translation.en: uh, when governments change,
translation.zh: 当政府更换的时候

translation.en: they no longer act, or they no longer have a raison d'être
translation.zh: 他们不再行动了也不再有理由这样做了

translation.en: to participate in the violence of the state.
translation.zh: 去参与国家的暴力

translation.en: And this is one of the reasons, I think, understanding perpetrators is vital
translation.zh: 我觉得这是其中一个原因理解行凶者很重要

translation.en: is for us to think critically about, um-- about our relationship to the state
translation.zh: 能让我们去辩证地思考我们与国家的关系

translation.en: and what the state is telling us to do.
translation.zh: 国家让我们做什么

translation.en: [narrator] The German Reich before the war.
translation.zh: 战前的德意志帝国

translation.en: In 1933, the Nazis come to power
translation.zh: 在1933年 纳粹当权

translation.en: and change the laws to conform with their ideas.
translation.zh: 改变了法律 去顺应他们的想法

translation.en: The ruthless hatred of Jews becomes state doctrine,
translation.zh: 对犹太人无情的仇视成为了国家的教义

translation.en: and they immediately begin to drive all the Jews out of German society.
translation.zh: 他们立刻开始将所有犹太人从德国社会驱逐出去

translation.en: About 2000 anti-Jewish laws are passed.
translation.zh: 大约有两千条反犹太法律通过

translation.en: A group of people is systematically excluded, stigmatized and humiliated.
translation.zh: 一群人被系统地排除被污名化 被羞辱

translation.en: [Welzer, in German] The first step towards mass murder
translation.zh: 迈向大屠杀的第一步

translation.en: is a categorical distinction between "us" and "them."
translation.zh: 就是“我们”和“他们”分成不同的类别区分开

translation.en: Everyone noticed people losing their jobs,
translation.zh: 所有人都注意到人们失去了自己的工作

translation.en: being forced to leave their homes,
translation.zh: 被迫离开自己家

translation.en: having their belongings auctioned off, businesses being "Aryanized."
translation.zh: 自己的物品被拍卖生意被“亚利安化”

translation.en: All of that was a public process.
translation.zh: 所有这些都是公开程序

translation.en: It wasn't a secret.
translation.zh: 这并不是秘密

translation.en: And that process reinforces the division.
translation.zh: 这个过程加强了分裂

translation.en: They are "them," while "we" are the others.
translation.zh: 他们是“那些人”而我们是不一样的

translation.en: If I define someone as different in theory
translation.zh: 如果我把一个人在理论上定义为不同

translation.en: and also treat them differently in practice,
translation.zh: 在实际操作中也给他们区别对待

translation.en: the willingness to use violence against that person
translation.zh: 对这个人使用暴力的意愿

translation.en: will naturally grow.
translation.zh: 就会自然产生

translation.en: [narrator] The physical violence escalates during the war.
translation.zh: 战争期间 身体的暴力升级

translation.en: Under German occupation, pogroms occur in the East.
translation.zh: 在德国占领下 东部发生了大屠杀

translation.en: Jews are attacked by civilians.
translation.zh: 犹太人被平民攻击

translation.en: Pictures from Lemberg in the summer of 1941.
translation.zh: 1941年夏天伦贝格的照片

translation.en: The occupiers fuel these outbreaks of violence.
translation.zh: 占领者助长了暴力的爆发

translation.en: Those who do survive are later killed by the Germans.
translation.zh: 那些活下来的人 后来被德国人杀了

translation.en: A perpetrator who was present in Lemberg testifies in court after the war.
translation.zh: 一个在伦贝格的行凶者在战后法庭上作证

translation.en: [in German] Our leader told our group of 12 men about our future tasks.
translation.zh: 我们的首领告诉我们团队12个人未来的任务

translation.en: We would have to gather up and shoot the Jewish population.
translation.zh: 我们必须聚集起来 射杀犹太民族

translation.en: The convoy stopped about 70 to 90 meters from the pit.
translation.zh: 护送队在距离坑70到90米的地方停下

translation.en: [in German] The Gruppenführer divided up his men as follows…
translation.zh: 分队长把他的手下这样分组…

translation.en: …six men to guard and six men to shoot.
translation.zh: …六个人守卫 六个人开枪

translation.en: [in German] I was tasked with shooting.
translation.zh: 我被分配到了开枪任务

translation.en: [in German] The shooting then proceeded as follows…
translation.zh: 然后枪杀这样进行…

translation.en: …about 45 to 50 people were separated and led to the pit.
translation.zh: …大约45到50人被分出来 领向深坑

translation.en: [in German] They had to line up facing us.
translation.zh: 他们必须面朝我们排队

translation.en: [in German] And that's how they were shot.
translation.zh: 他们就是这样被射杀的

translation.en: They saw this as the job, as the task, as arbeit,
translation.zh: 他们把这件事当成工作当成任务 当成劳动

translation.en: uh, something that this was what they had to do.
translation.zh: 有时候这是他们必须做的事

translation.en: Uh, so, in that sense, it is-- it is routinized.
translation.zh: 所以这样说来 是例行公事

translation.en: But I think they were still always aware of the difficulty of it.
translation.zh: 但我认为他们依然始终清楚做这件事的难度

translation.en: As I said, they're always aware that they got a dirty deal.
translation.zh: 就像我说的 他们始终清楚他们要做肮脏的事情

translation.en: They were asked to do something that was extremely hard,
translation.zh: 他们被要求做非常困难的事情

translation.en: uh, and it was their bad luck that they had been assigned to this battalion
translation.zh: 他们被分到这个大队 是他们的不幸

translation.en: and sent to do this.
translation.zh: 被派去做这种事

translation.en: [Welzer, in German] Each of the perpetrators developed their own way
translation.zh: 每个行凶者都发展出了自己的方式

translation.en: of justifying what they were doing.
translation.zh: 在内心将他们做的事情合理化

translation.en: "Someone has to do the dirty work."
translation.zh: “总有人要去干这些脏活”

translation.en: Or maybe, "We have a historical duty to fulfill."
translation.zh: 或者“我们有历史责任要履行”

translation.en: Another factor might have been, "I'm better at this than other people."
translation.zh: 另一个因素可能是“我比其他人更擅长”

translation.en: They all had justifications
translation.zh: 他们都有内心说服自己的方式

translation.en: that allowed them to find meaning in the murders.
translation.zh: 让他们找到这次谋杀的意义

translation.en: Ultimately, this shows that mass murder
translation.zh: 最终 这展现出了大屠杀

translation.en: is committed by thinking people who do not execute orders like a machine,
translation.zh: 是由能理智思考的人做出的不是像机器一样严格执行命令

translation.en: but who think and comprehend what they are doing.
translation.zh: 而是能思考能理解他们所做事情的人

translation.en: [officer, in German] I tried, and was able, to shoot only children.
translation.zh: 我试了 只能射杀儿童

translation.en: The man next to me would shoot the mother, and I would shoot her child.
translation.zh: 我身边的人会射杀母亲我射杀她的孩子

translation.en: I told myself that the child, after all,
translation.zh: 我告诉自己那个孩子毕竟

translation.en: would not be able to live without its mother.
translation.zh: 没有了母亲无法存活

translation.en: [in German] He translates his truly appalling act
translation.zh: 他把自己非常可怕的行为诠释成了

translation.en: into something morally good in a sense of "redemption."
translation.zh: 像是“赎罪”一样的道德善事

translation.en: That's the key to understand why the men did this.
translation.zh: 这是理解这些人为什么这样做的关键

translation.en: It is not blind obedience.
translation.zh: 不是盲目服从命令

translation.en: Instead, they interpret the commands in a way that is acceptable for them
translation.zh: 而是把命令诠释成他们可以接受的样子

translation.en: and allows them to see themselves as morally righteous.
translation.zh: 让他们可以把自己看成在道德上是正确的

translation.en: [narrator] Why were children also shot?
translation.zh: 为什么儿童也被射杀了？

translation.en: Ohlendorf is asked to explain.
translation.zh: 奥伦多夫被要求解释

translation.en: This question is crucial
translation.zh: 这个问题对

translation.en: to the proceedings against the leaders of the Einsatzgruppen.
translation.zh: 控告特别行动队的首领非常关键

translation.en: [Ferencz] I put that question.
translation.zh: 我提出的这个问题

translation.en: He said, "Because if they grew up,
translation.zh: 他说：“因为如果他们长大

translation.en: and they knew what we did to their parents,
translation.zh: 了解到我们对他们父母做了什么

translation.en: they would be enemies of Germany.
translation.zh: 就会成为德国的敌人

translation.en: And I was interested in a long-range protection of my Vaterland.
translation.zh: 我想要长久地保护祖国

translation.en: And therefore, it's necessary to kill the children, too."
translation.zh: 于是 杀掉他们的孩子也很必要”

translation.en: [narrator] Otto Ohlendorf, himself a father of five children,
translation.zh: 奥托·奥伦多夫自己是五个孩子的父亲

translation.en: does not show the slightest hint of remorse.
translation.zh: 丝毫没有任何悔意

translation.en: What about Major Wilhelm Trapp?
translation.zh: 威海姆·特拉普少校呢？

translation.en: Does he understand his wrongdoing?
translation.zh: 他明白自己做错了吗？

translation.en: [Browning] He knows what he is doing is terrible.
translation.zh: 他知道自己做的事情很恐怖

translation.en: He even says to his chauffeur at one point,
translation.zh: 他甚至有一次对他的司机说

translation.en: "God forbid Germany lose this war,
translation.zh: “上帝禁止德国输掉这场战争

translation.en: because if what we are doing here in Poland is ever,
translation.zh: 因为如果我们在波兰这里做的事情

translation.en: in a sense, brought to justice, God have mercy on us Germans."
translation.zh: 以后在某种程度上伸张正义希望上帝能对德国仁慈”

translation.en: [officer, in German] Only afterwards did it occur to me that it wasn't right.
translation.zh: 只有事后我才意识到 这是不对的

translation.en: [officer 2, in German] You started to flounder,
translation.zh: 你开始辗转反侧

translation.en: the clear ideas you used to have were gone.
translation.zh: 你以前有的明确想法已经不在了

translation.en: [in German] Stop arguing!
translation.zh: 别吵了！

translation.en: [narrator] The men are desensitized by the constant killing.
translation.zh: 那些人因为不断杀人而产生了钝感

translation.en: -[in German] Stop it! -[in German] He started after all!
translation.zh: -别说了！-是他开始的！

translation.en: For God's sake!
translation.zh: 上帝啊！

translation.en: -What do you want? -I want to go home!
translation.zh: -你想怎样？-我想回家

translation.en: To me, in a sense, one of the most horrifying conclusions
translation.zh: 对我来说 某种程度上这件事产生的最恐怖的

translation.en: that came out of this is that over time,
translation.zh: 一个结论是 随着时间过去

translation.en: the battalion kind of broke into three groups.
translation.zh: 整个大队基本上分成了三群人

translation.en: One group was a group of men who learned to enjoy killing other human beings.
translation.zh: 第一群人是学会了享受杀害其他人类的一群人

translation.en: Uh, and they came back from these killing operations
translation.zh: 他们从这些杀戮行动回来

translation.en: and had a big lunch and would joke about what they had done.
translation.zh: 美美午餐一顿对他们做过的事情开玩笑

translation.en: [narrator] One person who finds particular pleasure in killing is Hartwig Gnade.
translation.zh: 一个在杀人中找到快乐的人是哈特维格·内德

translation.en: He becomes a brutal and sadistic murderer who takes pleasure
translation.zh: 他变成了一个残忍的杀人犯以杀害受害者之前

translation.en: in torturing the victims before the shootings.
translation.zh: 折磨他们为乐

translation.en: Jews are forced to crawl naked along the path to the pit,
translation.zh: 犹太人被迫脱光身子顺着深坑爬

translation.en: while Gnade orders his men to beat the victims with clubs.
translation.zh: 而内德命令他的手下用棍棒打他们

translation.en: So here is someone who was literally changed
translation.zh: 所以这里有个人因为他们做的事情

translation.en: by what they were doing and by what they were seeing,
translation.zh: 他们看到的东西 完全改变了

translation.en: and degenerates into a very horrible person
translation.zh: 在非常短的时间内 就退化成了

translation.en: in a fairly short period of time.
translation.zh: 一个非常可怕的人

translation.en: And there was a middle group. They were kind of the passive ones.
translation.zh: 还有介于中间的一群人他们算是有点被动的一群

translation.en: When they were asked to take part in an operation,
translation.zh: 当他们被要求参与行动的时候

translation.en: they did whatever they were told,
translation.zh: 他们按照命令行动

translation.en: but they never took the initiative
translation.zh: 但他们从来没有主动去

translation.en: either to get out of it or to do more.
translation.zh: 想要走出这种状况或者想进行更多任务

translation.en: [narrator] The third group are the objectors.
translation.zh: 第三类是反对者

translation.en: Like Lieutenant Heinz Bumann,
translation.zh: 比如亨兹·布曼中尉

translation.en: who had himself transferred back to Hamburg
translation.zh: 几周后 他就把自己

translation.en: after just a few weeks.
translation.zh: 转回到了汉堡

translation.en: But that didn't make him a hero.
translation.zh: 但这并没有让他成为一名英雄

translation.en: [in German] They always found ways to do it
translation.zh: 他们总会找到方法

translation.en: that would keep the machine running.
translation.zh: 让机器保持运行

translation.en: Someone would say they were indisposed or they felt too weak that day.
translation.zh: 有些人会说他们那天感觉不舒服或者感觉太虚弱了

translation.en: But it wasn't an act of resistance,
translation.zh: 但那不是反抗的行为

translation.en: it was just an attempt to extract the individual
translation.zh: 只是试着把个人从中抽离

translation.en: without questioning the legitimacy of the police battalion as a whole.
translation.zh: 而不去质疑整个警察大队

translation.en: [narrator] The members of the Reserve Police Battalion
translation.zh: 预备警察大队的成员

translation.en: are involved in the shooting of 38,000 Jews.
translation.zh: 参与射杀了3.8万犹太人

translation.en: And they send another 45,000 to extermination camps.
translation.zh: 把另外4.5万送到了灭绝营

translation.en: [in German] The terrifying and central issue
translation.zh: 101预备警察大队一案中

translation.en: in the case of Police Battalion 101
translation.zh: 可怕的核心问题是

translation.en: is that you don't need to act out of conviction,
translation.zh: 你不需要出于信念行动

translation.en: to be motivated by ideology,
translation.zh: 受到意识形态的驱使

translation.en: to carry out a mass killing.
translation.zh: 就可以执行大屠杀

translation.en: [narrator] There are over 130 police battalions during the Second World War.
translation.zh: 二战期间有超过130个警察大队

translation.en: Of all these units, the Hamburg Battalion has the fourth highest murder rate.
translation.zh: 所有大队中汉堡大队谋杀人数排名第四

translation.en: Reserve Police Battalion 101, in a sense, is atypical.
translation.zh: 某种程度来说101预备警察大队并不典型

translation.en: And that, in a sense, makes it even more frightening.
translation.zh: 那在某种程度上让这件事更恐怖了

translation.en: We see what a battalion without any preparation,
translation.zh: 我们看到了没有任何准备未经筛选 未经灌输

translation.en: without selection, without indoctrination, without nazification,
translation.zh: 未经纳粹化的警察大队

translation.en: can nonetheless become one of the most prolific killing units
translation.zh: 都可以变成德国秩序警察中

translation.en: in the German order police.
translation.zh: 杀人数量最多的一个杀人小队

translation.en: [narrator] Nuremberg, April 10th, 1948. The day of the verdict.
translation.zh: 纽伦堡 1948年4月10日 判决当天

translation.en: [Ferencz] Death by hanging.
translation.zh: 绞刑

translation.en: Then they take their hands off, put it down, nod to the judge, step back.
translation.zh: 然后他们把手拿下来放下 对法官点头 往后退

translation.en: And boom, to the lift.
translation.zh: 然后走到了电梯

translation.en: And down they go into hell.
translation.zh: 然后就下了地狱

translation.en: I went down to the death house, which is right underneath the courthouse,
translation.zh: 我去了法院下面的死刑室

translation.en: to talk to him.
translation.zh: 跟他聊天

translation.en: I had never talked to any defendant, not one word, outside of the courtroom.
translation.zh: 我之前从来没有在法庭外跟任何被告交谈过

translation.en: Although I hoped that he would say to me--
translation.zh: 虽然我希望他能对我说…

translation.en: When I went down to see him, and I knew he was going to hang for sure,
translation.zh: 我下去看他的时候我知道他一定会被执行绞刑

translation.en: um, "Can I do something for you?"
translation.zh: “有什么可以为你做的吗？”

translation.en: I thought he would say, "Tell my children I love them, tell my wife I'm sorry."
translation.zh: 我以为他会说“告诉我的孩子们我爱他们 告诉我妻子 我很抱歉”

translation.en: Not one word of remorse or regret.
translation.zh: 没有任何忏悔或者悔意

translation.en: He said he would shoot his own sister if he had to under similar circumstances.
translation.zh: 他说在相似的状况下如果要枪杀他妹妹 他也会开枪

translation.en: "Goodbye, Mr. Ohlendorf," I said, and slammed the door on him.
translation.zh: 我说“再见 奥伦多夫先生”然后在他面前关上了门

translation.en: I did a broadcast for CNN, and they said,
translation.zh: 我去了美国电视台的节目 他们说

translation.en: "How did it feel to be talking to these monsters?"
translation.zh: “跟这些怪物说话是什么感觉？”

translation.en: And I said, "They were not monsters."
translation.zh: 我说“他们不是怪物”他们说“这话是什么意思？”

translation.en: They said, "What do you mean? They killed thousands of children.
translation.zh: 我说“他们不是怪物”他们说“这话是什么意思？” 他们杀了成千上万的儿童这种人不是怪物？

translation.en: You don't call that monster?"
translation.zh: 他们杀了成千上万的儿童这种人不是怪物？

translation.en: I said, "Is the man who dropped the bomb, the atomic bomb on Hiroshima,
translation.zh: 我说“在广岛投下原子弹的人

translation.en: was he also a monster?"
translation.zh: 他是怪物吗？”

translation.en: That was President Truman.
translation.zh: 那是杜鲁门总统

translation.en: I never got an answer to that question.
translation.zh: 那个问题我始终没有得到答案

translation.en: So, I have no doubt that Ohlendorf was a German patriotic man
translation.zh: 所以我毫不怀疑奥伦多夫是德国的爱国人士

translation.en: and he carried out what he thought was in the interest of his country.
translation.zh: 他执行了他认为对自己国家有利的事情

translation.en: But that's not an argument which a normal human being
translation.zh: 但那不是一个普通人应该被允许

translation.en: should be allowed to make and walk free.
translation.zh: 说出的话 还让他逍遥法外

translation.en: [narrator] After the war, the Germans want to forget.
translation.zh: 战争后 德国想要遗忘

translation.en: And so do the police.
translation.zh: 警察也想遗忘

translation.en: 60,000 police officers were involved in mass shootings during the war.
translation.zh: 六万名警官在战期间参与大屠杀枪击

translation.en: Many stay in law enforcement after 1945.
translation.zh: 很多人1945年后留在了执法部门

translation.en: Not until the end of the 1950s does it actually become clear
translation.zh: 后来直到20世纪50年代才开始清楚

translation.en: as to what extent ordinary Germans were involved in the Holocaust.
translation.zh: 德国普通人多大程度上卷入了大屠杀

translation.en: The judiciary investigates more than 172,000 men,
translation.zh: 司法部门调查了超过17.2万人

translation.en: including members of the SS, Gestapo, and the police.
translation.zh: 包括党卫军成员 盖世太保和警察

translation.en: Less than 500 of them are convicted
translation.zh: 不到500人因为

translation.en: for their involvement in the genocide.
translation.zh: 参与种族灭绝被判刑

translation.en: [Klemp, in German] The prosecution was a disaster.
translation.zh: 原告一方真是灾难

translation.en: Lots of material and documents had been collected,
translation.zh: 必须收集很多资料和文件

translation.en: there was really good evidence,
translation.zh: 真的有非常有力的证据

translation.en: but there was a lack of will to punish those who had been involved in the crimes.
translation.zh: 但缺少了意愿去惩罚那些参与犯罪的人

translation.en: [narrator] The Hamburg battalion is also brought under investigation.
translation.zh: 汉堡大队也被调查了

translation.en: 210 former members are questioned.
translation.zh: 210位曾经的成员被问讯

translation.en: Fourteen of them are charged in 1967.
translation.zh: 1967年 其中14人被起诉

translation.en: The trial succeeds in revealing details of the processes and patterns of behavior
translation.zh: 审判成功地揭露了队内行动

translation.en: within the battalion.
translation.zh: 和行为模式细节

translation.en: Julius Wohlauf is also prosecuted.
translation.zh: 朱利亚斯·霍劳夫也被起诉了

translation.en: The man who brought his wife to Poland.
translation.zh: 那个把他妻子带到波兰的人

translation.en: Many of these men, they view themselves as the double victim.
translation.zh: 这些人中很多把自己视为双向受害者

translation.en: They are the victim who has been chosen to do the dirtiest duty of the Third Reich.
translation.zh: 他们是被选择去做第三帝国最肮脏工作的受害者

translation.en: And then they're the victim of a ex post facto new morality or new law
translation.zh: 然后他们还是战后执行的新道德标准或新法律的

translation.en: that is put in after the war,
translation.zh: 受害者

translation.en: uh, that they consider utterly unfair to be applied to them
translation.zh: 他们认为新道德或法律强加在他们身上非常不公平

translation.en: because it wasn't illegal, uh, when they did it.
translation.zh: 因为他们当时杀人的时候并不是“违法”的

translation.en: It was what the government was ordering to be done.
translation.zh: 他们是去执行政府的命令

translation.en: So, they are consumed with self-pity, not with guilt.
translation.zh: 所以他们充满对自己的怜悯而非愧疚

translation.en: "Poor me."
translation.zh: “我真可怜”

translation.en: Not the victim, it's, "Poor me. Look what I was asked to do and had to do."
translation.zh: 受害者不可怜 “我真可怜 看我被要求去做了什么 被迫做了什么”

translation.en: [narrator] Only two defendants have to serve a prison sentence.
translation.zh: 只有两个被告被判监禁

translation.en: -One of the defendants… -[shutter clicking] …is Julius Wohlauf.
translation.zh: 其中一个被告是朱利亚斯·霍劳夫

translation.en: 83,000 people murdered, and none of them feel responsible.
translation.zh: 屠杀了8.3万人他们谁都不觉得是自己的错

translation.en: They were the stooges on the ground.
translation.zh: 他们是陆地上的奴才

translation.en: But each policeman had a freedom of choice,
translation.zh: 但每个警察都有自己的自由选择权

translation.en: a not inconsiderable amount.
translation.zh: 虽然选择的权力并不大

translation.en: Those who didn't murder out of conviction, they conformed.
translation.zh: 那些并非出于信仰杀人的人他们顺从了

translation.en: [Browning] I think, unfortunately, what it shows us
translation.zh: 我觉得很不幸 这向我们展示了

translation.en: is that all sorts of people can become killers under certain circumstances.
translation.zh: 在特定情况下各种人都可能变成杀手

translation.en: That regimes that want to commit genocide or mass murder
translation.zh: 那个想进行种族灭绝或者大屠杀的政府

translation.en: will never fail to do so for a lack of people who will pull the trigger.
translation.zh: 永远不会因为缺少扣动扳机的人而做不成这项事业

translation.en: [in German] There have been several genocides since the Holocaust.
translation.zh: 犹太大屠杀后 还有几次种族灭绝

translation.en: There have been massacres and mass murders.
translation.zh: 发生了残杀和大屠杀

translation.en: There are other contexts
translation.zh: 我们发现了其他的情况

translation.en: where we find those mechanisms
translation.zh: 有一些机制

translation.en: that lead people to kill others without any personal
translation.zh: 让人们去杀别人 而没有任何个人的

translation.en: or psychological motives.
translation.zh: 或者心理上的动机

translation.en: Wherever people can say to themselves, "I am only a cog in the wheel, I am not responsible."
translation.zh: 每次人们都可以对自己说“我只是时代的齿轮 不是我的错”

translation.en: With that attitude, almost anything is possible.
translation.zh: 有了这种态度 人几乎可以做任何事

translation.en: [narrator] The Holocaust was a unique crime in its planning and delivery.
translation.zh: 犹太大屠杀在计划和执行上是非常独特的犯罪

translation.en: Yet, to this very day,
translation.zh: 然而直到今天

translation.en: people continue being killed for belonging to a different group.
translation.zh: 人们依然会因为属于某个群体而被杀 （波斯尼亚 斯雷布雷尼察 1995年超过八千人被杀）

translation.en: [Browning] We like to think that we are the masters of our own destiny.
translation.zh: 我们喜欢认为我们是自己命运的主人

translation.en: But I do think, uh, that, in fact,
translation.zh: 但我觉得其实

translation.en: we are more shaped by things we have little control over.
translation.zh: 塑造我们更多的是我们很少能掌控的事情

translation.en: The way we gain greater control is simply by being more conscious of them.
translation.zh: 我们获得更大控制的方法就是更觉察这些事情

translation.en: One of the points of writing a book like Ordinary Men
translation.zh: 写《他们是平凡人》这本书的一个意义

translation.en: is so that people become more aware of our vulnerability, of our malleability,
translation.zh: 是让人们更加意识到我们的脆弱我们的可塑性

translation.en: so that, uh, when we face those kinds of circumstances,
translation.zh: 这样一来当我们在面对这些情况的时候

translation.en: uh, we're not taken by surprise.
translation.zh: 我们不会意外自己有能力

translation.en: That we have an ability to make a more conscious decision
translation.zh: 我们不会意外自己有能力 做出更理智的决定 而不是盲目跟从

translation.en: than we would otherwise.
translation.zh: 做出更理智的决定 而不是盲目跟从

translation.en: [Earl] Is a normal man a monster?
translation.zh: 普通人是怪物吗？

translation.en: I think all people are capable of doing things
translation.zh: 我觉得所有人都能够做出

translation.en: that they don't imagine that they're capable of doing.
translation.zh: 他们无法想象自己能做出来的事

translation.en: I think that we want to "other" perpetrators,
translation.zh: 我认为我们分离出“其他”行凶者

translation.en: people like Ohlendorf,
translation.zh: 像奥伦多夫这样的人

translation.en: because we don't want to look in the mirror and see ourselves reflected back.
translation.zh: 是因为我们不想看着镜子看到了自己反射的影子

translation.en: They wore suits, they were well-educated, they went to university,
translation.zh: 他们穿西装接受过良好教育 读过大学

translation.en: they spoke multiple languages.
translation.zh: 会说多种语言

translation.en: And I think we want to believe that we would never do what those men did.
translation.zh: 我认为我们想相信我们绝对不会做出那些人做出的事情

translation.en: You don't have to be ideological.
translation.zh: 你不必有意识形态

translation.en: You don't have to be, um, hateful.
translation.zh: 你不必仇视

translation.en: You don't have to be anything, and you can still kill.
translation.zh: 你不必有任何特殊之处依然可以杀人

translation.en: So, the question is, "Are normal or ordinary people monsters?"
translation.zh: 所以问题是“平凡人或者普通人是怪物吗？”

translation.en: I think we all have the potential to do that.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们都有那样做的可能性

translation.en: [narrator] The experience in Nuremberg shaped him forever.
translation.zh: 在纽伦堡的经历影响了他的一生

translation.en: Throughout his whole life, Benjamin Ferencz has worked to ensure
translation.zh: 本杰明·费伦茨终其一生致力于确保

translation.en: that crimes against humanity would not be repeated.
translation.zh: 危害人类的犯罪不会再重演

translation.en: It was also on his initiative
translation.zh: 在他的倡议下

translation.en: that the International Criminal Court was founded in The Hague,
translation.zh: 国际犯罪法庭在海牙建立

translation.en: where war crimes are still prosecuted today.
translation.zh: 至今战争犯罪依然在那里起诉

translation.en: [Ferencz] We are all inhabitants of one small planet.
translation.zh: 我们都是一个小星球的居民

translation.en: The idea is when we recognize
translation.zh: 我们需要意识到

translation.en: not that we have different religions, different countries, different colors,
translation.zh: 不是我们拥有不同的宗教来自不同国家 拥有不同肤色

translation.en: but all human beings inhabiting one small planet.
translation.zh: 而是所有人类共同居住在一个小星球上

translation.en: If we follow the same path, we will be successful.
translation.zh: 如果我们都追随同一条路我们就会成功

translation.en: If we don't, we'll cease to exist.
translation.zh: 如果我们不这样 就会灭绝消亡

translation.en: I've done my bit. I'm a hundred years old.
translation.zh: 我尽力了 我已经100岁了

translation.en: I don't know how much longer I can keep going.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己还能坚持多久

translation.en: But as long as I can, I will.
translation.zh: 但只要我能坚持 我就会继续

translation.en: Now I leave it to the young people to take the torch.
translation.zh: 现在我要把接力棒交给年轻人了

translation.en: -[in German] Come on, attention. For home. -[officers laughing]
translation.zh: 来 注意 为了回家

translation.en: -[shutter clicking] -Yeah, a little cuddling.
translation.zh: 对 稍微拥抱一下
